sourcesContent:
<template>
<!--  导航区-->
  <el-container>
    <el-header>
      <Navigation :router="router"/>
    </el-header>
<!--    内容区-->
    <el-main>
      <router-view></router-view>
      <el-alert
          title="错误提示的文案"
          type="error"
          show-icon>
      </el-alert>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
  import Navigation from "./components/Navigation";
  export default {
    name: 'App',
    data(){
      return {
          router:'/home'
      }
    },
    components:{
      Navigation,
      Comment
    },
    mounted() {
      this.$router.push(this.router)
      this.$bus.$on('router',(router) => {
        if (this.router !== router){
          this.router = router
          this.$router.replace(this.router)
        }
      })
    },
    beforeDestroy() {
      this.$bus.$off('router')
    }
  }
</script>

<style>
</style>
